thread.section_title: Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not A Bad Hotel
thread.title_full: Not A Bad Hotel - Review of Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dean S
title: Not A Bad Hotel
text:
We stayed here as a large group for a meeting we had at office in Paris. Check in was fast and efficient a bit like a hot desk reception area . Was surprised to pay for room in full up front .
My room was on the 2nd floor not a great view of flats at back I would recommend paying more for a Eiffel Tower view which you can do and I overheard reception up selling this .
Room was good comfortable bed plenty of pillows good tv with lots of channels mini bar bath robes and good size of a city centre hotel.
Bathroom a bit dated but clean plenty of towels and shower ok. Did not eat here in the evening but went to the bar which was a bit slow in serving us but a nice large bar area with table football also.
Location is great for the Eiffel Tower and Saine River both minutes away and a taxi rank out front also. Breakfast was good plenty of choice and omelette cooked to order tea coffee brought to you.
Checkout fast and efficient , if you want to be near the Eiffel Tower would recommend staying here .
